nodes.text: "A Fistful of Credits" is an adventure outline written by Bill Olmesdahl and published in 1992 as part of West End Games' Star Wars Gamemaster Screen for Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game, Second Edition. The adventure sends a group of spacers to resist a gang of pirates led by a Gotal named Jauxson as they raid the domed city of Buerhoz on the planet Clak'dor VII.
